energy.usef.agr.workflow.step

Class AgrReOptimizePortfolioStubUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.agr.workflow.step.AgrReOptimizePortfolioStubUtil

  • public class AgrReOptimizePortfolioStubUtil
extends Object
    Util class with logic which can be reused by any PBC in charge of the 'Re-Optimize Portfolio' workflow.

      Computes the flex factor for the portfolio re-optimization, using the target power and the potential flex available.

      Computes the target power for the portfolio re-optimization per connection group and PTU index using the prognoses power, ordered flex power and forecasted power.

      • EMPTY_MAP

        public static final Map<Integer,BigInteger> EMPTY_MAP

    • Method Detail

      • mapConnectionPortfolioPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,List<ConnectionPortfolioDto>> mapConnectionPortfolioPerConnectionGroup(List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connectionPortfolio,
                                                                                                Map<String,List<String>> connectionGroupToConnections)
        Creates a map structure linking the connection group entity addresses to their list of ConnectionPortfolioDto items.
        Parameters:
        connectionPortfolio - List of ConnectionPortfolioDto the connection portfolio.
        connectionGroupToConnections - Map with String USEF identifier of the connection group as key and List of String connection entity addresses of the connection group as value.
        Returns:
        a Map of String USEF identifier of the connection group as key and List of ConnectionPortfolioDto partial connection portfolio as value.

      • mapPrognosisPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> mapPrognosisPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(List<PrognosisDto> aPlans,
                                                                                            List<PrognosisDto> dPrognosis)
        Groups and sum the power of a list of prognoses per connection group entity address and ptu index.
        Parameters:
        aPlans - List of PrognosisDto A-Plans.
        dPrognosis - List of PrognosisDto D-Prognoses.
        Returns:
        a Map like connection_group_identifier > PTU_index > sum_of_the_power.

      • sumOrderedPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> sumOrderedPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(List<FlexOrderDto> flexOrders)
        Groups and sum the power of a list of flex orders per connection group entity address and ptu index.
        Parameters:
        flexOrders - List of FlexOrderDto A-Plans.
        Returns:
        a Map like connection_group_identifier > PTU_index > sum_of_the_power.

      • sumForecastPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> sumForecastPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(Map<String,List<ConnectionPortfolioDto>> connectionPortfolioPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                           org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                                                           Integer ptuDuration)
        Sums the forecast power values from the connection portfolio per connection group identifier and PTU index.
        Parameters:
        connectionPortfolioPerConnectionGroup - Map of String connection group identifier as key and List of ConnectionPortfolioDto as value; the connection portfolio already grouped per connection group identifier.
        period - LocalDate the period for which the method is called (needed to know the amount of PTUs for that period).
        ptuDuration - Integer the duration of a PTU in minutes (needed to know the amount of PTUs for the period and to know the amount of DTUs per PTU).
        Returns:
        a Map like connection_group_identifier > PTU_index > sum_of_the_power .

      • fetchTargetPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> fetchTargetPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> prognosisPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                           Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> orderedPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                           Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> forecastPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup)
        Computes the target power for the portfolio re-optimization per connection group and PTU index using the prognoses power, ordered flex power and forecasted power.
        Parameters:
        prognosisPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the prognoses power aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_power.
        orderedPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the ordered power aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_power.
        forecastPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the forecasted power aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_power.
        Returns:
        the target power (prognosis + order - forecast) in a Map aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_power.

      • sumPotentialFlexConsumptionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> sumPotentialFlexConsumptionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(Map<String,List<ConnectionPortfolioDto>> connectionsPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                                      org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                                                                      Integer ptuDuration)
        Aggregates the potential flexibility of consumption of the connection portfolio per connection group and PTU index.
        Parameters:
        connectionsPerConnectionGroup - Map of String connection group identifier as key and List of ConnectionPortfolioDto as value; the connection portfolio already grouped per connection group identifier.
        period - LocalDate the period for which the method is called (needed to know the amount of PTUs for that period).
        ptuDuration - Integer the duration of a PTU in minutes (needed to know the amount of PTUs for the period and to know the amount of DTUs per PTU).
        Returns:
        the potential flex of the portfolio aggregated in a Map as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_potential_flex.

      • sumPotentialFlexProductionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> sumPotentialFlexProductionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(Map<String,List<ConnectionPortfolioDto>> connectionsPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                                     org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                                                                     Integer ptuDuration)
        Aggregates the potential flexibility of production of the connection portfolio per connection group and PTU index.
        Parameters:
        connectionsPerConnectionGroup - Map of String connection group identifier as key and List of ConnectionPortfolioDto as value; the connection portfolio already grouped per connection group identifier.
        period - LocalDate the period for which the method is called (needed to know the amount of PTUs for that period).
        ptuDuration - Integer the duration of a PTU in minutes (needed to know the amount of PTUs for the period and to know the amount of DTUs per PTU).
        Returns:
        the potential flex of the portfolio aggregated in a Map as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_potential_flex.

      • fetchFlexFactorPerPtuPerConnectionGroup

        public static Map<String,Map<Integer,BigDecimal>> fetchFlexFactorPerPtuPerConnectionGroup(Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> targetPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                          Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> summedPotentialFlexConsumptionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup,
                                                                                          Map<String,Map<Integer,BigInteger>> summedPotentialFlexProductionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup)
        Computes the flex factor for the portfolio re-optimization, using the target power and the potential flex available.
        Parameters:
        targetPowerPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the target power aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_the_power.
        summedPotentialFlexConsumptionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the potential flex consumption aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_potential_flex.
        summedPotentialFlexProductionPerPtuPerConnectionGroup - Map with the potential flex production aggregated as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > sum_of_potential_flex.
        Returns:
        the flex factor (target_power / potential_flex, bounded to [0,1]) in a Map as connection_group_identifier > ptu_index > flex_factor.
